column3: Slave AXI Lite bus to communicate with PS. Connect to AXI_smartconnect.
IP-core general clock. It should be connected to 100 MHz.
Active low reset. Reset the IP Core and its registers. When set to 1 the ip-core automatically start the initialization of ADC chips. Connect to 100 MHz reset.
Slave AXI Lite clock. Connect to clk of 100 MHz.
Active low reset for Slave AXI Lite module. Connect to reset_n.
